categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Griffon Flight Wing was a Rebel squadron.
The squadron saw action during the subjugation of Ralltiir. During the battle, they engaged the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Devastator.
Notable pilots included Elyhek Rue and Wenton Chan, who later went on to fly with Red Squadron, both dying over the Death Star during the Battle of Yavin.
